concept.title: Taglets Overview
concept.shortdesc: So what are taglets all about?

section.p: Taglets are an extension to the Javadoc framework. It is not only a way of capturing, but also of way filtering Javadoc output within the code. The idea of the Taglets is to highlight to the reader certain aspects of the code; the how and the why and not just the what. Taglets stand out against normal Javadoc and can be customised by changing the supplied style sheet or by changing the configuration XML file.
